item.title: Static site deployments with Hugo and GitHub Actions
item.description: Introduction It’s been almost two and a half years since I’ve updated this website. While I was away, GitHub Actions was released and Hugo jumped from version 0.31 to 0.70! My old Hugo code no longer builds and instead of updating incrementally, I decided it was easier to just rebuild from scratch with the latest version. At the same time, I would update the theme1 I use and integrate GitHub Actions to replace the now-unnecessary deployment script 23.
